name: luster-purge
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user looses a damaging burst of light. It may also reduce the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The user looses a damaging burst of light. It may also reduce the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user looses a damaging burst of light. It may also reduce the target’s Sp. Def stat.
